name: photo-of-the-night-july-13-2009-you-go-ari-gold
title: Photo Of The Night: July 13, 2009 [You Go, Ari Gold]
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Jeremy Piven and Ed Helms made a surprise appearance at Tootsies tonight. Your Nashvillest editors managed to scramble out of the house fast enough to catch Piv
contentEncoded: Jeremy Piven and Ed Helms made a surprise appearance at Tootsies tonight. Your Nashvillest editors managed to scramble out of the house fast enough to catch Piv at the drumset in a rousing rendition of “Sweet Home Alabama.”
